channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 3 - DNS Special Thanks Much of this information adapted from slides by Seth Galitzer History 1965 - ARPANET 1969 - 4 Nodes 1971 - 15 Nodes 1982 - TCP/IP Developed 1984 - Over 1000 Hosts 1987 - Over 20000 Hosts hosts.txt Hosted by SRI Maps System Names to IP Addresses Updated Manually Difficult to Avoid Collisions Maintain Consistency Across Systems Domain Name Service (DNS) Developed in 1983 (RFC 882-883) Finalized in 1987 (RFC 1035-1035) Distributed System of Name Servers Hierarchical, Consistent Name Space Multiple Protocols and Data Types Image Source: Wikipedia
